description: This source file defines static string variables used for tracing messages related to constructors, destructors, and assignment operators within the WPEFramework's Trace namespace. It also includes header files and conditionally includes a Windows-specific trace factory.

classes.name: Constructor
classes.description: Class representing a trace message for constructor calls, holding static text.

classes.name: Destructor
classes.description: Class representing a trace message for destructor calls, holding static text.

classes.name: CopyConstructor
classes.description: Class representing a trace message for copy constructor calls, holding static text.

classes.name: AssignmentOperator
classes.description: Class representing a trace message for assignment operator calls, holding static text.

methods.name: Constructor::_text
methods.description: Static string holding the message for constructor calls.

methods.name: Destructor::_text
methods.description: Static string holding the message for destructor calls.

methods.name: CopyConstructor::_text
methods.description: Static string holding the message for copy constructor calls.

methods.name: AssignmentOperator::_text
methods.description: Static string holding the message for assignment operator calls.

ctags.name: _text
ctags.pattern: /^    \/* static *\/ const string AssignmentOperator::_text(_T("Assignment Operator called"));$/

ctags.name: _text
ctags.pattern: /^    \/* static *\/ const string CopyConstructor::_text(_T("Copy Constructor called"));$/
